content:
Largely I just don't know that we get value out of this that outweighs the downsides.

I wish you said this before I spent an hour on it :(
I have not had the time to look over the patch in detail until now, I'm afraid.

simulacrum said:

I have not had the time to look over the patch in detail until now, I'm afraid.

assuming the try build succeeds, are you ok with me approving it? some things like using arrays instead of x="$x --arg" really do make it easier to read
Yes, given it's the start of the cycle.
I'm just saying that I will not / do not have the time to fix regressions etc this introduces, so we will likely just revert it wholesale if it does that and no one steps up quickly to fix them.
I'll try to get quick fixes in for any issues, I expect them to be reasonably easy to fix although not perhaps to figure out
